actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit an estimate of the cost which would be incurred by the State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.
short_title: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1980

summary.text: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1980 - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit the costs which would be incurred by State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.

titles.title: State and Local Government Cost Estimate Act of 1980

A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to require the Congressional Budget Office, for every bill or resolution reported in the House or Senate, to prepare and submit an estimate of the cost which would be incurred by the State and local governments in carrying out or complying with such bill or resolution.
